sentences.sContent: His passion for horseracing carried him astray.
sentences.sContent_eng: His passion for horseracing carried him astray.
sentences.sCn: 他对赛马运动的酷爱使他误入歧途。

sentences.sContent: For ye were as sheep going astray; but are now returned unto the Shepherd and Bishop of your souls.
sentences.sContent_eng: For ye were as sheep going astray; but are now returned unto the Shepherd and Bishop of your souls.
sentences.sCn: 你们从前好像迷路的羊。如今却归到你们灵魂的牧人监督了。

sentences.sContent: The first thing we did was look for errors in our experimental design and for every conceivable scenario that could have led us astray.
sentences.sContent_eng: The first thing we did was look for errors in our experimental design and for every conceivable scenario that could have led us astray.
sentences.sCn: 我们的第一个动作是寻找的实验设计哪里出了差错，并想遍每一种可能让我们误入歧途的状况。

synos.tran: 迷路的；离开正道的；不对头的

remMethod.val: a + stray(走离) → 走离正道 → 误入歧途的

trans.tranCn: 迷路的， 误入歧途的
